description: This file sets up an asynchronous agent using the Sambanova model and runs a response printing function for a specific prompt.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: An agent class that interacts with models and handles responses.

classes.name: RunResponseEvent
classes.description: Represents an event in the response stream from the agent.

classes.name: Sambanova
classes.description: A model class representing the Sambanova model used by the agent.

methods.name: agent.run
methods.description: Method to run a prompt through the agent, optionally streaming responses.

methods.name: agent.aprint_response
methods.description: Asynchronously prints the response for a given prompt.
